channel.title: Turn into barrows
channel.description: ok how would i make a command that when i wear full dharoks, and legends cape, i turn into the npc dharok? kinda like a set transformation.

item.title: Turn into barrows
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

no no no thats not what i mean. i mean you only turn into the noc dharok when you wear the barrows gloves, full dharoks, and legends cape. if youre not wearing all of them, then you dont turn into it. like:

if playerSet(barrows) == true
{
npcId = dharoks id (cant remember);
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

sooty for the bad java that what i kinda imagine that codes as turining into. please a fairly fluent java person please help.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 10:02:47 PM[/size][hr]so can nayone help?

Read full topic

item.title: Turn into barrows
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

zyle1992:

ok first you CAN move when your an npc, second i dont want to use pnpc, i want to be able to wear dharoks helm, axe, legs, top, barrows gloves, and the legends cape and turn into dharok.

How about spawning the items?

Read full topic

item.title: Turn into barrows
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == #### == true){
npcId = ####;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == #### == false){
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

just find a ring and put its itemID in it and look for the npc id youwant and place it where it says
npcId = ####;

and there you go

Read full topic
